title: Hudge lines
text: The waiting line where hudge to each atraction point and this definitly ruins the experience. I was waiting for one hour to buy a hot dog and a bottle of water and I left the que becouse I still had 20 persons in front.

title: decent greek restaurant
text: If you want to eat greek food in Bucharest there are few possibilities, and this is one of the best. The food is ok, but the service is not that good and the prices are high respect any other greek restaurant in Bucharest.

title: to spicy for me
text: To be honest I'm not a fan of Mexican food so this could be the reason that I didn't liked very much this restaurant. The sweet beer is awful don't tryout.

title: very good pizza
text: The pizza is very good is made in traditional Italian forn, al forno, I've been there with both of my kinds an we have spent a very nice evening

title: Amazing building
text: The restaurant is placed in a very well renovated old building on Pache Protopopescu street. The food is very good and the service is fast and client needs oriented.

title: 40 min for a bad pizza
text: we have spend 40 minutes waiting for a pizza that you can buy from every corner of the streets. The waiter tried his best but was not enough. They where faster with the greek salad

title: very nice dinner
text: very good food, local products, the service was perfect even we didn't booked before they have offered a table for 4 persons. Fried zucchini and some tomatoes and cheese balls where just amazing.

title: history
text: Is a very special place, you're feeling that you walking where the biggest mans of Ancient Greece used to walk 2000 years ago. Impressive.

title: amazing view
text: amazing 360 degrees view of Athens. You can see all the important points of Athens from the highest point of the city.

title: A lot of rocks
text: Very nice museum, if you interested in ancient history is a perfect place for you if you’re not could e boring

title: Greek bazaar
text: Interesting street full of souvenir stores good for every client from good quality authentic products to chinese cheap products

title: Beneth Omonia square
text: Beneth Omonia square, very good service, price and very important very good coffe and prices good respect the competition.

title: Best sisha in town
text:
Here you can smoke the best sisha in town and you can eat a lot of oriental products. The humus is incredible, and they serve very good alcoholic and nonalcoholic cocktails. This is the location from
Barbau Vacarescu on Calea victoriei they dont have kitchen and they serve just pizza from Jerrys pizza.

title: Nice beer garden
text: This is the oldest inn in Bucharest, just next to the Old Court Museum. They have very good beer and a lot of Romanian dishes. You can try mici and french fries and cabage salad.

title: Tasty pizza
text:
The pizza is very good, italian style, fresh
Ingriedients. Quattro formagi is my favorite. The price is pretty big for Bucharest.

title: Cheap and fast
text: All the products are freshly backed. They are selling traditional romanian bastry. If you’re in a hurry and you want to eat something in 5 min is perfect place to go.

title: Best donuts in town
text: There is another owner of Donut Studio, but the donuts are just amazing. I love that one that is filled with pasticera cream. They are doing just delivery, check out their website.

title: Beer garden
text: Very good food and service. You can try all the products of romanian cuisine. It is a very nice place both for lunch and for dinner.

title: Good and fast
text: Very good food, everything fresh. My favorite dish is nam-bo. It’s the best vietnamese food in town.

title: Best design
text: Very nice design, very good atention to all the details. Good place to drink a cofee and make plans.

title: Best humus
text: Very good food and service if you like sirian cuisinine is one of the best in town. Highly reccomend a visit there.

title: Best romanian restaurant
text: The oldest restaurant in Bucharest, very good client service, very good and traditional romanian dishes. And I need to tell you a secret they have fix menu for lunch for 25 ron you can’t finish food.

title: Very good food
text: If you are expecting a good client service experience is not the right place, but you want to eat kebab, humus, falafel is one of the best in Bucharest!

title: Decent experience
text: If you like to wait half an hour for a cold dish is the perfect place for you. The prices are a bitt spicy. The restaurant is very nice designed and it’s telling you a story.

title: Very nice place for kids
text: My kids had a lot of fun here for about 5-6 hours. Good quality of the attractions, safe oriented employes. The design of all the parc is very nice.

title: Very good service
text: Positive atitude from the waiters, nice and confy sunbeds. The entrance in the water is smoothly so it is ok also for kids.

title: Best cakes
text: They have one of the best cakes in town, the taste is very good and they are looking very good. My favorite one is corneto filled with vanila cream.

title: Very nice
text: Nice restaurant with the view on Herastrau lake. Nice atmosphere and very good food. Good service and again the view is impresive.

title: Nice ruins
text: Nice castle, with very nice gardins and some view points. Prety hard to find the entrace if you’re coming from the wrong direction.

title: Turist trap
text: When you’ll see the menu you’ll wonder why the prices are so low. After you will eat, you will have your answer. All the ingredients are really low quality. If you want to eat a potato, order the simple one or the one with butter.

title: Gastronomic journey
text: Best experience in Malaga. You need to try the smoked fish, goat cheese with foi gras and paprica marmelade. Ask to drink vodca very nice experience. One of the best restaurants that I ever visited.

title: Delicious food
text: Very good service. Delicious dishes. Location close to the stadium. Worth going to eat here. Everything very clean

title: Very good coffee
text: Good and cheap coffee, nice and quiet, ocean view. Good and rapid service centraly located and very decorated

title: Just if you’re fun of hunting
text: There some trofees of wildpig, deer, bear and wolfes. If you’re interested about hunting ia good place to spent half an hour.
place: Muzeul de Stiintele Naturii si Cinegetica

title: Decent experience
text: The food was good, the terace is pretty big with a lott of tables, the prices are pretty small respect other cities in Romanian, this was the only restaurant visited in Vatra Dornei so i don’t other prices from here.

title: Nice and quiet
text: Very nice park with old trees, some statues next to very ortodox curch, can’t remember the name. You can spent one hour there enjoying the silence.

title: Nice museum
text: You can see here some traditional costumes, hand painted eggs, some traditonal houses tipical for that part of the country.

title: Cozy place
text: Perfect place to enjoy your tea or coffee. It is like a fairytaill house. They have a lot of diferent typesvof tea.

title: Best coffee shop
text: The experts in the coffee industry, if you like coffee it is the place to go. They have fresh roasted coffee.

title: Average experience
text: The food was very good, the service was ok. I know very well what i need to pay as tips you don't need to do the math for me.

title: Pleasant experience
text: Best Port Wine tasting. The owner was very happy to give us all the informations about Portugal. He is in love with his own town Porto. Highly recommend to make a visit here.

title: Awful experience
text: Very hard to find the location, free wine tasting, you can skip it, you don't miss anything. Hard to believe that the tour bus can associate the brand whit these place

title: very good coffee
text: very friendly staff, nice and cozy atmosfere, they have just 4 tables. Is near the parking Cocor. Recommend!

title: Very nice week
text: Ive spent a week here it was a very nice experience i recomend you to come here. The owner is very polite and she try to help you even she didnt speak english. They have an amazing garden with a big barbeque. Vasiliki is situated in the best part of the island.

title: Very good food
text:
Good atmosphere, good food, dont missed it. Is family bussines and they make all their best to make you happy. I recomend you to came here.
Va recomand sa veniti aici proprietarii vorbesc romaneste si mancarea e foarte buna.

title: good food
text: is a place were you can eat a good food at a decent price and very fast. dont missed it if you go to ikea. i

title: best grill in bucharest
text: If you like to eat romanian is a very good restaurant. is in the north part of the city near baneasa airport. Go there if you want to eat romanian food.

title: Chrismas Market
text: The Chrismas Market is just amazing, you can feel the magic everywhere. The hot vine is fantastic. The hawe a lot of things hand-made.

title: decent experience
text: Its a nice restaurant, good atmosphere, they have a very good lunch offer at 20 ron. You can eat romanian food without spending a lot of money.

title: best ecler
text: Their sweets are very good, the portions are enormous. quality-price ratio is very good. They have very good care of their customers.
